<h3>**Hello world!**</h3>

<h2 class="custom-subtitle">

Welcome to my world!

</h2>

This website is a personal project to explore my adventures around the world!

To begin, this map explores the locations I have lived in blue and the countries I have visited in purple. In my spare time I will add more details and blog posts to this map, and a filter to explore specific trips. For now, click each icon and it will display a link that goes to my empty blog page. Hover over the right corner to explore more viewing options!

The day/night view will update with the current time!

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)

# BASE DATAFRAME -----
travel_list <- tribble(~long, ~lat, ~name, ~status, ~trip, ~link,
           -77.4169, 39.1459, "Hometown", "home", "Home", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -71.3128, 41.4901, "Home 1996-1997", "home", "Home", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -76.6019, 39.4015, "Home 2013-2016", "home", "Home", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -120.2308, 37.8389, "Home 2020", "home", "Home", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -112.0740, 33.4484, "Home 2021-2022", "home", "Home", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -119.6982, 34.4308, "Home 2022-2023", "home", "Home", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -77.3049, 25.08588, "Bahamas", "travel", "Vacation", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -71.4074, -11.8880, "Peru 2015", "travel", "Research Trip", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           120.9759, 14.6014, "Philippines 2015", "travel", "Visiting Friends", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -84.1383, 9.3911, "Costa Rica 2017", "travel", "Vacation", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           23.4272, -30.7396, "South Africa 2017", "travel", "Africa 2017", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           23.0581, -19.1939, "Botswana 2017", "travel", "Africa 2017", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           25.8445, -17.9234, "Zimbabwe/Zambia 2017", "travel", "Africa 2017", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -102.5323, 39.9189, "Roadtrip around US 2019", "travel", "Half-year Roadtrip", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html",
           -102.2543, 21.2841, "Central Mexico 2021", "travel", "Visiting Friends", "https://ericamarie9016.github.io/travels/posts.html"
           )

# TEXT FOR LEAFLET POPUP -----
travel_list <- travel_list |> 
  dplyr::mutate(label = paste0("<b>", htmltools::htmlEscape(travel_list$name), "</b> <br>",
                              '<a href = "',
                              travel_list$link, 
                              '"target="_blank">Blog Post</a>'))

# SET CUSTOM ICON -----
# https://rstudio.github.io/leaflet/markers.html
awesome_icons <- awesomeIconList(
  "home" = makeAwesomeIcon(icon = "home",
                           library = "fa",
                           marker = "blue"),
  "travel" = makeAwesomeIcon(icon = "plane",
                             library = "fa",
                             marker = "purple"))


# MAKE MAP -----
leaflet(data = travel_list, options = leafletOptions(minZoom = 1, maxZoom = NULL)) |> 
  addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") |> 
  addAwesomeMarkers(~long, ~lat, 
                    label = ~name,
                    popup = ~label, 
                    group = travel_list$trip,
                    icon = ~awesome_icons[status]) |> 
  addLayersControl(   # Control which layers are viewed
    overlayGroups = travel_list$trip,
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE),
    position = "topright"
  ) |> 
  addTerminator() |>    # Displays current night/day
  addMiniMap(
    tiles = providers$Esri.WorldImagery,
    toggleDisplay = TRUE
  )



# CLUSTER -----
```
